name: Swap (itch) (adadaadadade)
description:
A puzzle game about swap. You could swap position or size of  objects in game, even yourself.

WASD to Move

Mouse to look around

Space to jump

F to action

MLB to shoot blue ball

MRB to shoot red ball

Q to Swap Position

E to Swap Size

Some ideas of game design from fuze.

Asset and some code from:

Kenney • Home

SIsilicon/Godot-Planar-Reflection-Plugin (github.com)

SIsilicon/Godot-3D-text-plugin (github.com)
